pokepoet

  • godlike no-game/zero-player game
  • questionnaire to define poet traits
  • poet starts writing poems based on defined traits
  • two ways of interaction (don't know which ones yet)
  • poets die at a certain point
  • traits like: muse, movement, century, addictions
  • events: written poem, heartbreak, revolution
  • data: project Gutenberg mainly, perhaps some Twitter or Google search for added spice
  • each trait gives different amounts of points to stanzas/words?
  • submit to hall of fame / Pulitzer / Nobel?

rationale

  • mass produced poems from already written stuff
  • simple enough to create
  • not so sure on theoretical background, if any
  • willingly simple and not political
  • general: not sure I ever want to say anything, more keen on clashing stuff together and seeing if anything comes out of it. Unscientific particle accelerator (?)

tech

  • How am I going to tag everything? Will this work with generic author tagging? or would it only work with stanza tagging?

  • Prototype: just an assembler of stanzas, completely random, that blurts out a "poem" every 10 minutes.
